vocab.title: Common Ways to Say Thank You

word.romaji: A-nata no shin-se-tsu na ko-to-ba ni kan-sha shi-masu

word.english: Teachers like you are not easy to find
word.romaji: Anata no yō na kyōshi o mitsukeru no wa kantan de wa arimasen

word.english: Thank you for spending time with us.
word.romaji: Watashitachi to issho ni jikan o sugoshite kudasari, arigatō gozaimasu.

word.english: Thank you for being patient and helping me improve.
word.romaji: Watashi ga jōtatsu suru yō, nintaizuyoku tasukete kudasatte, arigatō gozaimasu.
Anata wa saikō no sensei desu!

word.english: I have learned so much thanks to you.
word.romaji: Anata no okage de takusan no koto o manabimashita.
